사이오닉 몬스터

PSIONIC MONSTERS

사이오닉 생명체

PSIONIC CREATURES

Any creature with 사이오닉 파워 has 사이오닉 하위 유형. A psionic creature can be born with the subtype or can gain the subtype during its life.

A creature meeting any one of the following criteria has 사이오닉 하위 유형:

• Creatures with a power point reserve, including characters who have 레벨 in a character class that grants them a power point reserve or creatures who have the 거친 재능 feat.

• 유사사이오닉 능력을 가진 생명체, including characters who have racial 유사사이오닉 능력.

• Creatures that have spell-like 능력 described as “사이오닉.”

Traits: Other than the fact that all 사이오닉 생명체 have 사이오닉 파워, 파워 포인트, or 유사사이오닉 능력, 사이오닉 생명체 have no specific traits. 사이오닉 하위 유형 serves to 식별 creatures that may be vulnerable to powers, 주문, and effects targeting 사이오닉 생명체.

사이오닉 하위 유형

THE PSIONIC SUBTYPE

사이오닉 하위 유형 applies to creatures that can use 사이오닉 파워 or 능력 or that have the ability to manifest powers. (In other words, a creature with 사이오닉 하위 유형 either has a power point reserve or has 유사사이오닉 능력.) It also applies to creatures from other sources that have spell-like 능력 labeled as “사이오닉.”

Characters who have 레벨 in any class that grants the use of 사이오닉, or who have 유사사이오닉 능력 as racial traits, gain 사이오닉 하위 유형.

Traits: Other than the fact that all 사이오닉 생명체 have 사이오닉 파워 or 유사사이오닉 능력, 사이오닉 생명체 have no specific traits. 사이오닉 하위 유형 simply identifies creatures that may be vulnerable to powers, 주문, and effects targeting 사이오닉 생명체.

언데드 사이오닉 생명체
Undead Psionic Creatures

A psionic undead creature, although rare, is a force to be reckoned with.

Because undead are immune to mind-affecting effects (including charms and compulsions), they are particularly threatening to other 사이오닉 생명체 and characters (especially 정신감응가). Psionic undead creatures can use mind-affecting powers on the living, even though they themselves are immune to such 공격. However, an undead creature may have 사이오닉 하위 유형 if it meets the criteria described above, and thus be vulnerable to non-mindaffecting powers or effects that specifically affect 사이오닉 생명체.

Intelligent constructs and plants with 사이오닉 파워 or 유사사이오닉 능력 also share this advantage.

사이오닉 파워

PSIONIC POWERS

Creatures with 사이오닉 파워 are similar to creatures with racial spellcasting ability. They have the ability to manifest powers just as a member of a psionic character class can (and can activate 사이오닉 아이템 accordingly).

Creatures with the ability to use powers are subject to the same rules for 파워 구현 that characters are, but they are not actually members of a class and do not gain any class 능력 unless otherwise specified.

Creatures with 사이오닉 파워 generally emulate the manifesting ability of a particular psionic class. When such a creature takes 레벨 in that same class, it can stack its innate 사이오닉 파워 and its class power progression together.

Creatures with 사이오닉 파워 that take 레벨 in a class other than the one they emulate combine their two power point reserves into a single reserve, but they manifest powers from each psionic class separately.

유사사이오닉 능력

PSI-LIKE ABILITIES

Most 사이오닉 몬스터 have some number of 유사사이오닉 능력. These are very similar to spell-like 능력. Naturally, they are psionic and work just like powers or 주문. A creature with 유사사이오닉 능력 does not pay for these 능력 with 파워 포인트 and does not pay any XP cost associated with manifesting the power the ability duplicates.

유사사이오닉 능력 do not work in a 무의 사이오닉 장 and are subject to 파워 저항 if the power or spell the ability duplicates would be subject to 파워 저항. A psi-like ability usually has a limit on how often it can be used. A psi-like ability that can be used at will has no use limit. Using a psi-like ability is a standard action unless noted otherwise, and doing so while threatened provokes 기회 공격. It is possible to make a 집중 check to use a psi-like ability defensively and avoid provoking 기회 공격, just as when using a power or casting a spell. A psi-like ability can be interrupted just as a spell can be. 유사사이오닉 능력 cannot be used to counterspell, nor can they be counterspelled.

All 유사사이오닉 능력을 가진 생명체 are assigned a 구현자 레벨, which indicates how difficult it is to dispel their psi-like effects and determines all 레벨-dependent variables (such as 범위 or 지속시간) 능력 might have. When a creature uses a psi-like ability, the power is manifested as if the creature had spent a number of 파워 포인트 equal to its 구현자 레벨, which may augment the power to improve its 피해 or save DC. However, the creature does not actually spend 파워 포인트 for its 유사사이오닉 능력, even if it has a power point reserve due to racial 능력, class 레벨, or some other psionic ability.

The DC of a 내성 굴림 (if applicable) against a creature’s psi-like ability is 10 + the 레벨 of the power or spell the ability duplicates + the creature’s Cha modifier. Remember to check the power’s Augment entry to see if the creature’s 구현자 레벨 (and thus the effective power point expenditure) increases the DC of the 내성 굴림. Changes to the effect’s save DC, 피해, and so on are noted in the psi-like ability entry.

사이오닉 집중
Psionic Focus

Some creatures have 특기 that can be used only when the creature is psionically focused, or that require the creature to expend its 사이오닉 집중. Assume that such a creature is psionically focused before entering 전투.

유사사이오닉 능력과 특기
Psi-Like Abilities and Feats

Creatures with access to 유사사이오닉 능력 can use the 특기 유사주문 능력 강화 and 빠른 유사주문 능력.

These 특기 can be used only on 유사사이오닉 능력 that do not have increased effects due to augmentation. Furthermore, the creature can empower only a psi-like ability with a 레벨 less than or equal to half its 구현자 레벨 (round down) minus 2, and can quicken only a psi-like ability with a 레벨 less than or equal to half its 구현자 레벨 (round down) minus 4.

사이오닉 항목이 있는 생명체
Creatures with “Psionics” Entries

사이오닉 몬스터 often possess spell-like 능력 that are identified as “사이오닉,” instead of “spell-like 능력.” For all intents and 목적, creatures with spell-like 능력 described as 사이오닉 are considered to possess 유사사이오닉 능력, and they manifest their powers as described above.

사이오닉 주문
Psionic Spells

In some cases, a creature’s 유사사이오닉 능력 (or 능력 listed under a creature’s 사이오닉 entry) may include an effect that does not duplicate any listed power. For such 능력, simply use the existing spell 묘사. Treat the creature’s

구현자 레벨 as the 시전자 레벨 for the spell. The ability is still psionic in origin, so 주문 and powers that specifically affect 사이오닉 파워 can negate or reduce its effects as they would any other psionic power.

생명체의 사이오닉 버전
Psionic Versions Of Creatures

Below are presented psionic versions of the following creatures: 아볼레스, 코아틀, and 듀에르가,. These alternate versions are psionic equivalents of their standard counterparts.

Only the portions of the monster entry that are specifically changed by the addition of 사이오닉 rules have been listed.  All other elements of the creature remain the same.

사이오닉 생명체 항목 읽기

READING PSIONIC CREATURE ENTRIES
유사사이오닉 능력을 가진 생명체
Creatures with Psi-Like Abilities

Each of a creature’s 유사사이오닉 능력 has a 구현자 레벨. Each ability that allows a 내성 굴림 also gives a save DC in parentheses following the power 이름.

Powers that have increased effects due to augmentation include information about the effect. An asterisk indicates that the power has already been augmented by the creature’s innate ability.

Powers that can’t be augmented, or that are manifested at their normal minimum 레벨, do not contain any special notations. Resolve the effect of manifesting the power without augmentation at the creature’s given 구현자 레벨.

Some creatures may have particular powers that are manifested at a higher or lower 레벨 than their normal 구현자 레벨. In such cases, the 구현자 레벨 is given in the parenthetical information following the power 이름.

아볼레스, 사이오닉

ABOLETH, PSIONIC

Huge Aberration (Aquatic, Psionic)

특수 공격: 유사사이오닉 능력, slime

특기: 경계, 전투 구현, 강철의 의지

전투

COMBAT

A psionic 아볼레스 does not possess spell-like 능력 or the 노예화 ability of the standard 아볼레스. Instead, it has 유사사이오닉 능력, including psionic dominate.

유사사이오닉 능력: At will—행동불능화 (30-ft. cone, 12 HD, DC 20*), 거짓 감각 입력 (five targets, DC 16*), 정신 분열 (20-ft. radius, DC 18*), 정신연결 (unwilling, nine targets, DC 14*); 3/day—자아 채찍 (ML 7th, 2d4, DC 17*), 이드 암시 (ML 7th, three targets, DC 17*), psionic dominate (any target, 24 hours, DC 20*), 생각 방패 (파워 저항 21, 3 rounds*); 1/day—psionic 기억 조작 (DC 17), 원격 보기 (DC 17), 심령의 벽 (DC 17).

구현자 레벨 13th. The save DCs are 매력-based.

*Includes augmentation for the 아볼레스’s 구현자 레벨.

영적 구조물

ASTRAL CONSTRUCT

영적 구조물 are brought into being by the 재귀창조 power 영적 구조물. They are formed from raw ectoplasm (a portion of the astral medium drawn into 물질 세계). The 파워 포인트 spent by the construct’s creator during the manifestation of the power determine the 레벨 of the 영적 구조물 created. However, even 영적 구조물 of the same 레벨 vary somewhat from each other, depending on the whims of their creators.

전투

COMBAT

영적 구조물 act as directed by their creators. As a free action, a construct’s manifester can direct the construct to 공격 particular enemies, use specific tactics or powers, 공연 other actions, or do nothing at all. The construct does exactly what its creator directs it to do.

An 영적 구조물 generally appears as an animate clump of ectoplasm with a vaguely humanoid shape, but the manifester can mold or sculpt one according to his or her whim within the limits imposed by the creature’s size. The quality of such “construct sculpture” is determined by a 제작 (sculpting) check. A result of 10 to 19 creates a creature that is recognizably similar to the desired creature shape; a result of 20 to 29 creates a construct that looks like an accurate portrayal of that creature type; a result of 30 or higher creates a construct that looks like a specific individual. No matter how high the 제작 (sculpting) check result, though, an 영적 구조물’s appearance can’t 숨기 the otherworldly material from which it is formed.

Construct Traits: An 영적 구조물 has immunity to 독, 수면, 마비, stunning, 질병, death effects, 강령술 effects, mind-affecting effects (charms, compulsions, phantasms, patterns, and morale effects), and any effect that requires a Fortitude save unless it also works on objects or is harmless. It is not subject to critical hits, 비치명적인 피해, ability 피해, ability drain, fatigue, exhaustion, or 정령 흡수. It cannot 치료 피해, but it can be repaired.

특수 능력: Every time an 영적 구조물 is created, the manifester can choose to apply one special ability to the construct. When the manifester begins to manifest the 영적 구조물 power, he chooses one or more 특수 능력 from a menu of 능력 appropriate to that 레벨 of 영적 구조물.

영적 구조물 만들기

CREATING AN ASTRAL CONSTRUCT

When manifesting the 영적 구조물 power, the manifester assembles the desired creature from a menu of choices, as specified in the construct’s 수치 표. A manifester can always substitute two choices from a 하급 menu for one of its given 능력. Multiple selections of the same menu choice do not stack unless the ability specifically notes that stacking is allowed.

Some menu choices grant an 영적 구조물 the ability to manifest specific powers as 유사사이오닉 능력. Unless using the ability is a free action, an 영적 구조물 manifesting such a power does so as a standard action that provokes 기회 공격. All such powers have a 구현자 레벨 equal to the 영적 구조물’s 히트 다이스 or the creator’s 구현자 레벨, whichever is lower.

An 영적 구조물 does not need to meet the 전제조건 for a feat granted by a menu choice.

영적 구조물 메뉴 A

Astral Construct Menu A

A manifester creating a 1st-레벨, 2nd-레벨, or 3 레벨 영적 구조물 can choose one special ability from this menu.

Buff (Ex): The 영적 구조물 gains an extra 5 히트 포인트.

Celerity (Ex): The 영적 구조물’s land 속도 is increased by 10 feet.

쪼개기 (Ex): The 영적 구조물 gains the 쪼개기 feat.

Deflection (Ex): The 영적 구조물 gains a +1 deflection bonus to 방어도.

비행 (Ex): The 영적 구조물 has physical wings and a 비행 속도 of 20 feet (average).

향상된 황소 쇄도 (Ex): The 영적 구조물 gains the 향상된 황소 쇄도 feat.

Improved Slam 공격 (Ex): The 영적 구조물 gains the 향상된 고유 공격 feat.

기동성 (Ex): The 영적 구조물 gains the 기동성 feat.

강한 공격 (Ex): The 영적 구조물 gains the 강한 공격 feat.

저항 (Ex): Choose one of the following energy types: fire, cold, acid, electricity, or sonic. The 영적 구조물 gains 저항 5 against that energy type.

수영 (Ex): The 영적 구조물 is streamlined and 상어 like, and gains a 수영 속도 of 30 feet.

넘어뜨리기 (Ex): If the 영적 구조물 hits with a slam 공격, it can attempt to 넘어뜨리기 the opponent as a free action without making a touch 공격 or provoking 기회 공격. If the attempt fails, the opponent cannot react to 넘어뜨리기 the 영적 구조물.

영적 구조물 메뉴 B

Astral Construct Menu B

A manifester creating a 4th-레벨, 5th-레벨, or 6 레벨 영적 구조물 can choose one special ability from this menu. Alternatively, the construct can have two 특수 능력 from Menu A.

Energy Touch (Ex): If you are a 염동력자, the 영적 구조물’s physical 공격 are wreathed in your energy type, dealing an extra 1d6 points of energy 피해. If you are not a 염동력자, the 영적 구조물 deals an extra 1d4 points of 피해 of an energy type you choose (fire, cold, acid, or electricity) when you manifest the construct.

Extra 공격: If the 영적 구조물 is Medium or smaller, it gains two slam 공격 instead of one when it makes a 전력 공격. Its bonus on 피해 rolls for each 공격 is equal to its 근력 modifier, not its 근력 modifier x 1-1/2. If the 영적 구조물 is Large or larger, it gains three slams instead of two when it makes a 전력 공격. Its 공격 are otherwise unchanged.

빠른 치료 (Ex): The 영적 구조물 치료 2 히트 포인트 each round. It is still immediately destroyed when it reaches 0 히트 포인트.

Heavy Deflection (Ex): The 영적 구조물 gains a +4 deflection bonus to 방어도.

Improved Buff (Ex): The 영적 구조물 gains an extra 15 히트 포인트.

향상된 치명타 (Ex): The 영적 구조물 gains the 향상된 치명타 feat with its slam 공격.

Improved 피해 축소 (Ex): The 영적 구조물’s surface forms a hard carapace and provides an additional 3 points of 피해 축소 (or 피해 축소 3/magic if it does not already have 피해 축소).

Improved 비행 (Ex): The 영적 구조물 has physical wings and a 비행 속도 of 40 feet (average).

Improved Grab (Ex): To use this ability, the construct must hit with its slam 공격. A construct can use this ability only on a target that is at least one size smaller than itself.

Improved 수영: The 영적 구조물 is streamlined and sharklike, and gains a 수영 속도 of 60 feet.

Muscle (Ex): The 영적 구조물 gains a +4 bonus to its 근력 score.

독 Touch (Ex): If the 영적 구조물 hits with a melee 공격, the target must make an initial Fortitude save (DC 10 + 1/2 영적 구조물’s HD + 영적 구조물’s Cha modifier) or take 1 point of 건강 피해. One minute later, the target must save again or take 1d2 points of 건강 피해.

Pounce (Ex): If the 영적 구조물 돌격 a foe, it can make a 전력 공격.

Smite (Su): Once per day the 영적 구조물 can make one 공격 that deals extra 피해 equal to its 히트 다이스.

짓밟기 (Ex): As a standard action during its turn each round, a Large or larger 영적 구조물 can literally 달리기 over an opponent at least one size smaller than itself. It merely has to 이동 over the opponent to deal bludgeoning 피해 equal to 1d8 + its Str modifier. The target can attempt a Reflex save (DC 10 + 1/2 영적 구조물’s 히트 다이스 + 영적 구조물’s Str modifier) to negate the 피해, or it can instead choose to make an 공격 of opportunity at a –4 penalty.

영적 구조물 메뉴 C

Astral Construct Menu C

A manifester creating a 7th-레벨, 8th-레벨, or 9 레벨 영적 구조물 can choose one special ability from this menu. Alternatively, the 영적 구조물 can have two 특수 능력 from Menu B. (One or both of the Menu B choices can be swapped for two choices from Menu A.)

Blindsight (Ex): The 영적 구조물 has blindsight out to 60 feet.

Concussion (Sp): The 영적 구조물 can manifest 뇌진탕 폭파 (구현자 레벨 7th) as a free action once per round.

Constrict (Ex): The 영적 구조물 has the improved grab ability with its slam 공격. In addition, on a successful 드잡이 check, the 영적 구조물 deals 피해 equal to its slam 피해.

차원 슬라이딩 (Sp): The 영적 구조물 can manifest 차원 슬라이딩 (구현자 레벨 equal to 히트 다이스) as a 이동 action once per round.

에너지 화살 (Sp): The 영적 구조물 can manifest 에너지 화살 (구현자 레벨 8th) as a standard action once per round. The creator sets the energy type that the 영적 구조물 can manifest when he creates it.

Extra Buff (Ex): The 영적 구조물 gains an extra 30 히트 포인트.

Extreme 피해 축소 (Ex): The 영적 구조물’s surface forms hard, 갑옷-like plates and provides an additional 6 points of 피해 축소.

Extreme Deflection (Ex): The 영적 구조물 gains a +8 deflection bonus to 방어도.

Natural 투명화 (Su): The 영적 구조물 is constantly invisible, even when attacking. This ability is inherent and not subject to the 투명상태 정화 spell.

파워 저항 (Ex): The 영적 구조물 gains 파워 저항 equal to 10 + its 히트 다이스.

Rend (Ex): The 영적 구조물 makes claw 공격 instead of slam 공격 (it deals the same amount of 피해 as it would with its slam 피해, but does slashing 피해 instead of bludgeoning 피해). An 영적 구조물 that hits the same opponent with two claw 공격 in the same round rends its foe, which deals extra 피해 equal to 2d6 + 1-1/2 times its Str modifier.

탄성 공격 (Ex): The 영적 구조물 gains the 탄성 공격 feat.

훨윈드 공격 (Ex): The 영적 구조물 gains the 훨윈드 공격 feat.

1 레벨 영적 구조물

1ST-LEVEL ASTRAL CONSTRUCT
Small Construct
히트 다이스:1d10+10 (15 hp)
선제권:+2
속도:30 ft. (6 squares)
방어도:18 (+2 Dex, +5 natural, +1 size), touch 13, flatfooted 16
